title: Google Store discounts Pixel 6 and 6 Pro by $100 when you buy with financing
content:
Before today, the US Google Store had yet to discount the Pixel 6 this cycle in a possible sign of consistent demand. Now, and for the next two weeks, you can get a $100 discount as statement credit when buying the Pixel 6 or 6 Pro through financing.

more…

The post Google Store discounts Pixel 6 and 6 Pro by $100 when you buy with financing  appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: For the next two weeks, you can get a $100 discount through statement credit when buying the Pixel 6 or 6 Pro through financing...
